name: Math Knight (AlexKircher)
description:
MathKnight is a puzzle game about solving easy math problem in cool graphic style.

Use your math skills to fight against evil.

Control:

  • 1-9 and minus to type the answer
  • Enter to enter and check the answer 

Thanks for this awesome sprites for :

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-ghoul-sprites

https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character

https://ansimuz.itch.io/parallax-forest

https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

Play and have fun!  

Any suggestions are welcome in the comments
